DCharacter.Name: Ellemera
DCharacter.PlayerNotes:
Daughter of poacher. Knows hunting, tracking, woodcraft. Likes bows. Quiet. (Not so much actually). Pair of former wilderness enthusiast boots Green Tatoo on Right Hand Bow (Bloodfinger), my name is Makranth
Notes:
Ellemera basic memory of life is being alone. Sure, Mom was there for a while and Dad was gone, but when Mom died, he did do the minimum and was there for her. But, Dad was always competing, I do this better than you, I do that better than you. But having said all that Dad did teach her one thing. He taught her to survive. Alone.
Ellemera survived alone and likes being left alone. Many thinks she is ‘quiet’, but that isn’t quite the truth. She tells the truth, as she sees it. Something she has noticed is that people don’t like hearing the truth, they think she’s ‘whining’ or ‘bitching’, but in the end she’s always seems to right. Ellemera has come to the conclusion that people want the truth, they just don’t want to hear it.
Now this ‘quest’ has hit her right in the middle of the face. She knew she should have left that body be. This whole farce isn’t worth the 20 GP she found. Every time she tries something new, it bites her in the ass. Now she’s trapped doing something for this ‘Dr. Evil’, a bunch of ratboys and a bunch of folks she never dealt with in the real world for obvious reasons and now all she wants to be is what she likes being. Alone. But, she knows the rules of these ‘quests’. But given the chance. Later Chuck and Di.
It’s not that she doesn’t want to have friends. She will even let her friends call her ‘Ellemera’. Everyone else calls her Elly May. Her Dad always did.
So far, she actually tried to be friends with Thalia, but that didn’t seem to work. Hank. Hank she simply doesn’t want to piss that guy off. Doughboy. Or was that Dogboy? Head case, but some interesting ideas. Mark ‘Man of Action’? ‘Man of Mystery’ is more like it. Than. Her least favorite at the start, but he’s not as much of a coward as she thought. Squid. Squid. Simple reliable. Good in a fight. He’ll keep me alive through this. Him I’ll protect. Then Than. The rest……
The ratboys. Twice. Twice we could have dumped them, but they don’t want to hear the truth. You wait and see, Dr. Evil will replace them with some other set of twerps.
This adventure will be the death of me I just know it. I’ve got to find a way out so I can be alone. I’ll bide my time play my roll.
Current thought: This is crap! What a pointy nose and talons? Bit in the ass again! But, knowing the rules, this too shall pass. These are just disguises.
Notes to resolve:

Weapon.Name: Mighty Longbow (+2)
Weapon.Description:
Mighty Longbow (+2) : DMG 1d8 CRIT x3 RANGE 110ft TYPE Martial Ranged SOURCE PHB (3.0) NOTES : See rules
Upon command, a shock weapon is sheathed in crackling electricity. The electricity does not harm the hands that hold the weapon. Shock weapons deal +1d6 points of bonus electricity damage on a successful hit. Bows, crossbows, and slings so enchanted bestow the electricity energy upon their ammunition. Caster Level: 8th; Prerequisites: Craft Magic Arms and Armor, call lightning or lightning bolt; Market Price: +1 bonus. A weapon of speed allows the wielder one single extra attack each round at the wielder’s highest bonus. It is not cumulative with haste. The extra attack must be with this weapon. The weapon does not grant the benefits of a haste spell, simply an extra single attack with this weapon. Caster Level: 7th; Prerequisites: Craft Magic Arms and Armor, haste; Market Price: +4 bonus. null null null null

DCharacter.Name: Squid
DCharacter.PlayerNotes: bastard son of blacksmith. Not too bright, but quite strong. Easily frustrated, and easily lead. Starting to look like a dragon (elongated face, pointed teeth, talons) My name is Visktath Grey spikey stone tattoo on palm of right hand; Gold stud in his tongue Hank is his friend and advisor, and handles all of his money- My home is north of Heil Feat Path: 12: Unarmored Spec, Unarmored Mast, STR+1,14: Improved Critical, 15: Greater Weapon Spec; 16: Elite Weapon Mastery, STR+1 18: ; 19: ; 20: ,STR+1 Things I have killed: Animated Object, Bombadier Beetle, Darkmantle, Dire Rat, Dire Wolf, Dire Wolverine, Displacer Beast, Earth Elemental sm, Fire Elemental md & elder, Gelatenous Cube, Hell Hound, Ogre, Ogre Magi, Skeleton, Gargantuan & Giant Spider, Swamp Ogre, Thug, Thug/Assassin, Troll, Viper, Zombie Last Update 3/9/09
DCharacter.ModNotes: Power Attack (11 max) Great Cleave Locking Gauntlets

PlayerItems.Notes: Holds 10 Potions. Free action to retrieve.

Weapon.Name: Greatsword
Weapon.Description:
Greatsword : DMG 2d6 CRIT 19-20/x2 RANGE - TYPE Martial Melee SOURCE PHB (3.0) NOTES :
Upon command, a flaming weapon is sheathed in acid. The acid does not harm the hands that hold the weapon. Acid weapons deal +1d6 points of bonus acid damage on a successful hit. Bows, crossbows, and slings so enchanted bestow the acid energy upon their ammunition. Caster Level: 8th; Prerequisites: Craft Magic Arms and Armor and Melf's Acid Arow, Acid Orbs, or Acid Spray; Market Price: +1 bonus. null null null null null
